title: Latest Straw Poll Updates, Steaking Celtics
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps to discuss the latest MVP straw poll results including an incredibly tight race between Embiid and Jokic. Then, the crew talks the Celtics hot play of late.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
